## PolarTileDataSourceOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PolarTileDataSourceOptions extends DataSourceOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [debugTiles](./harp-mapview.polartiledatasourceoptions.debugtiles.md) | boolean | Enable debug display for generated tiles. Default is false. |
|  [geometryLevelOffset](./harp-mapview.polartiledatasourceoptions.geometryleveloffset.md) | number | Optional level offset of regular tiles from reference datasource to align tiles to. Default is -1. |
